Neusoft CT Scan 16 Slices    Equipment Description    Equipment Model Brand     CT Scan 16 Slices Neusoft    Neusoft CT Scan 16 Slices Specifications Gantry Focal Spot to Detector Distance: Not more than 1050mm  Aperture: At least 70cm Rotation Speed/360° : 0.78 second or less  Laser Light for Patient Positioning: 5 or more  Tilt Angle : At least ± 30° mechanical  Table  Load Capacity: At least 205kg Min Table Feed Speed: 1mm/s or less Max Table Feed Speed: 100mm/s or more Scannable Range: 1550mm or more Couch vertical movement Range: 430mm(or less) -970mm(or higher)  Tube  Focal Spot Size: 0.4mm x 0.7mm or smaller, 0.6mm ×1.3mm or larger Tube Size: At least 4MHU  Tube Cooling Rate : 667 KHU/min or higher
Generator  Type: High Frequency compact generator Max Power: At least 28 KW Tube Current Range: 10mA～233mA  kV Mode: 80 - 140 kV with at least 4 option    Detector Slices/Rotation: At least 16 slice
 Detector Rows: At least 32 Rows Detector Coverage: At least 20mm  Computer Console  CPU: Host CPU, Dual Core; Recon CPU, Quad Core Intel Xeon or better RAM storage: Host, 16G; Recon, 8G or more Image Capacity: At least 500GB Display Monitor: At least 23” Color LCD Monitor Monitor Resolution: At least 1280 x 1024 Standard DICOM  Computer Workstation  CPU: 6 Core RAM storage: 16G Image Capacity: At least 500GB Display Monitor: At least 19” Color LCD Monitor Monitor Resolution: At least 1280 x 1024  Standard DICOM  Reconstruction Speed: At least 12 images/second Multiple Reconstruction matrix: 512x512, 768x768,1024 x 1024 or better Display Image matrix: 512x512, 768x768,1024 x 1024 or better. Thinnest Slice: Not more than 0.625mm Number of View/Rotation: At least 2320 view High-contrast Specification: >15lp/cm @ 0% MTF Low-contrast Specification: 0.3% as better as 4mm Slow Pitch Scanning: At most 0.3 pitch Fast Pitch Scanning: At least 1.5 pitch  Software  Real Time Topography : Must present Automatic Monitoring of Contrast Enhancement: Must be present Auto Start Scan when HU reaches threshold: Must be present MIPS: Must be present Multi-planar Reformation (MPR): Must be present Pediatric Protocol: Must be present Dose Modulation: Must be present Dose Computation and Display: Must be present Vessel Measurable Analysis Virtual Endoscopy: Must be present Automatic Bone Removal: Must be present CT Angiography: Must be present  Others  Room Requirement of Gantry Room: Can fit in 19.0 Sq. m Power Requirement: Not more than 50 kVA Gantry Weight: Less than 1800 kg
